import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {MatFormFieldModule} from '@angular/material/form-field'; import { MatInputModule } from '@angular/material/input' import {MatIconModule} from '@angular/material/icon'; @Component({ selector: 'app-auth', templateUrl: './auth.component.html', styleUrls: ['./auth.component.scss'], standalone: true, imports: [MatFormFieldModule, MatInputModule, MatIconModule] }) export class AuthComponent { }
